alert.note: Alert for Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 1:40PM MST until December 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 20 to 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Upper Snake River Plain-Including the cities of Idaho Falls, Rexburg, and St. Anthony. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
